about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered which country gets the most rain? Which was the first ever land animal on Earth? Which country has more pyramids than Egypt? Or which country has the tallest people? Learn all of this and much more in Quiz & Learn: Geography. Test your knowledge to unlock photo rounds that contain amazing facts. You will definitely learn something you never knew!

Features

Over 200 multiple choice questions of varying difficulty

No time limit to answer

Easy controls

6 rounds that test your knowledge

6 rounds with amazing facts about geography illustrated with photographs

Relaxing soundtrack with 7 different tracks

24 Steam achievements

name: Quiz & Learn: Geography

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (or greater) or AMD Radeon HD 7600 (or greater)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible

short_description: A family-friendly, relaxing multiple-choice quiz about geography that includes photo rounds with interesting facts
